mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Purchase (userID, postID, userName, userEmail, userPhone, productName, productPrice, quantity, deliveryAddress, groupBuyId) VALUES (#{userId}, #{postId}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{quantity}, #{deliveryAddress}, #{groupBuyId})
mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM purchase p JOIN groupbuy g ON p.groupBuyId = g.groupBuyID WHERE g.status = 'completed' ORDER BY p.deliveryStatus ASC

SELECT P.*, MainImage.imageUrl AS mainImageUrl , Post.price, Post.totalprice, Post.discountRate, Post.title FROM Purchase P JOIN Post ON P.postID = Post.postId JOIN MainImage ON Post.postId = MainImage.postId WHERE P.userID = #{userID};
